text: Marayamana dikara isa'e du'a kari ke, he allaha! He amara palanahara! Amara para akasa manthi bhojana utara, ke te amara mate etale ke amara mam je pahela avanara ane je pachi avanara che te sauna mate, eka khusini vata tha'i jaya ane tara taraphathi eka nisani bani jaya ane tum amane roji api de ane tum badha apavavala karata saro che
